GeneDef.label: pack mentality
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of forming tightly knit communities, and become happier the stronger their community is.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Each pawn with this gene get a +50 to <color=#8a8ae6>opinion</color> about carriers of this gene.
Each carrier get a bonus to <color=#8a8ae6>mood</color>, the size of which is the number of pawns in the pack.
<color=#8a8ae6>Updated</color> once a <color=#8a8ae6>day</color> or when a new pawn is added to the pack.
